content: materials size e/3 5mm hook or preferred hook size i commonly use my clover amour hooks stitch marker s scissors stuffing tapestry needle chopstick dowel or something similar to help with stuffing worsted weight yarn medium size 4 in the brand and colors of your choice in this pattern i used caron one pound in white for the main ball and caron one pound in scarlet for the stitching abbreviations/stitches used chain - chain row - row single_crochet - single_crochet decrease - single_crochet 2 stitches together decrease slip_stitch - slip_stitch st s - stitch s - work instructions between brackets as many times as directed finished measurements the finished piece measures about 12 inches/ 30 48cm in circumference
